column4: hi every1 need some help. just bought a samsung r530 and i just installed ubuntu 9.04 but there seems to be a network problem cos neither the wireless nor the ethernet is working any help would be much appreciated????
unlikely anyone will help you with an old ubuntu release like that when it's most likely fixed in a later release.
that seems to be not working, so the advice is to do a fresh install of 10.04 instead.
